aboutBody: Hi! Welcome to my website, I am a professional actress and actor combatant, originally from Norfolk but now living it large in London. When not acting you can find me out running, digital painting or scribbling down ideas for creative projects in my journal. Have a look around my website and don't forget to say hi!
currentlyAppearing: I trained at The Guildford School of Acting, and received my combat qualifications in over 8 different weapons from the Academy of Performance Combat
